content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure that the target entity contains the items you wish to extract before attempting extraction.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Regularly check and refuel entities like Burner Mining Drills and Burner Inserters to prevent them from running out of fuel.

### Errors due to full chests
- Regularly clear chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and inserters.
